Positive Role Model - Activity 2

These activities can be led by a staff member or a trained student mentors/e-moderators

Virtual Learning Environments – Have a current student/trained student mentor lead a discussion, using the discussion forum, to relay their experience of studying etc., and answer new students’ questions

Virtual Learning Environments – Upload a video of one or more graduates and/or current students talk about their experience of studying etc. for new students to view. Have a related asynchronous discussion forum, or appoint a time for a synchronous chat discussion, where those graduates/students in the video can answer new students’ questions
